Title: The New World
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Frank Spotnitz (teleplay by)
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Joe Blake, a resistance fighter, leaves German New York with cargo for neutral Colorado. In Japanese San Francisco, Juliana Crane receives footage of the Allies winning the war and a bus ...
